project_plan.name: Python-based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks users multiple-choice questions, keeps track of their score, and displays it at the end of the game. The questions and answers will be stored as a variable inside the code.

task.name: Define the structure for multiple-choice questions and answers
Implement the logic to display questions one at a time
Implement functionality to gather and validate user input
Implement score tracking based on user responses
Display the total score at the end of the game
Write tests to ensure all components work correctly
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
